mean_en: an important assistant who helps the person who is the leader of a government, organization, etc.
word_etyma: deput代理 + y表示人 → 低一级的办事情人 → deputy 副手，代理人
sentence: The deputy of the Young Pioneers stands out and salutes.
sentence_trans: 少先队代表站出队列敬礼。
sentence_phrase: The deputy of the Young Pioneers
